.sr-only {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  border: 0;
}
.sr-only-focusable:active,
.sr-only-focusable:focus {
  position: static;
  width: auto;
  height: auto;
  margin: 0;
  overflow: visible;
  clip: auto;
}

html body {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
  margin-top: -1px;
  overflow-y: scroll;
  overflow-x: hidden;
}
html body a, html body a:hover, html body a:visited {
    text-decoration: none;
}
html body button, html body select, html body input {
    border-style: none;
}
html body button {
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0;
}
html body ul {
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
}
html body pre {
    background-color: #666;
    color: #e1e1e1;
    font-family: 'Microsoft Yahei';
    font-size: 14px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    word-wrap: break-word;
}
html body pre img {
      display: block;
      height: auto;
}
html body blockquote {
    border-left: 5px solid #bbb;
    padding-left: 10px;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
            box-sizing: border-box;
}
html body p {
    word-wrap: break-word;
}
html body .root {
    padding-left: calc(100vw - 100%);
}
@-webkit-keyframes registermove {
from {
    top: 30px;
    opacity: 0;
}
to {
    top: 0px;
    opacity: 1;
}
}
@keyframes registermove {
from {
    top: 30px;
    opacity: 0;

          -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s;
          transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s;
          transition: transform 0.3s;
          transition: transform 0.3s, -webkit-transform 0.3s;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input__label::before {
          border-top: 2px solid #fff;
          -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0) translate3d(0, -2px, 0);
                  transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0) translate3d(0, -2px, 0);
          -webkit-transition-delay: 0.3s;
                  transition-delay: 0.3s;
}

          background: #b2dfdb;
          -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 0, 1);
                  transform: scale3d(1, 0, 1);
          -webkit-transform-origin: 50% 0;
                  transform-origin: 50% 0;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input__labelContent {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        padding: 1em 0;
        width: 100%;
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s 0.3s;
        transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s 0.3s;
        transition: transform 0.3s 0.3s;
        transition: transform 0.3s 0.3s, -webkit-transform 0.3s 0.3s;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input--filled {
      margin-top: 2.5em;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input--filled:focus,
      #app .material .snotifyToast__input--filled .snotifyToast__input__field {
        opacity: 1;
        -webkit-transition-delay: 0.3s;
                transition-delay: 0.3s;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input__field:focus + .snotifyToast__input__label .snotifyToast__input__labelContent,
    #app .material .snotifyToast__input--filled .snotifyToast__input__labelContent {
      -webkit-transform: translate(0, -80%);
              transform: translate(0, -80%);
      -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.3, 1);
              transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.3, 1);
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input__field:focus + .snotifyToast__input__label::before,
    #app .material .snotifyToast__input--filled .snotifyToast__input__label::before {
      -webkit-transition-delay: 0s;
              transition-delay: 0s;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input__field:focus + .snotifyToast__input__label::before,
    #app .material .snotifyToast__input--filled .snotifyToast__input__label::before {
      -webkit-transform: translate(0, 0);
              transform: translate(0, 0);
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__input__field:focus + .snotifyToast__input__label::after,
    #app .material .snotifyToast__input--filled .snotifyToast__input__label::after {
      -webkit-transform: scale(1, 1);
              transform: scale(1, 1);
      -webkit-transition-delay: 0.3s;
              transition-delay: 0.3s;
      -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.3, 1);
              transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.3, 1);
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons {
      display: -webkit-box;
      display: -ms-flexbox;
      display: flex;
      -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
      -webkit-box-direction: normal;
          -ms-flex-flow: row nowrap;
              flex-flow: row nowrap;
      -webkit-box-pack: justify;
          -ms-flex-pack: justify;
              justify-content: space-between;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button {
        position: relative;
        width: 100%;
        border-right: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        border-left: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        border-top: none;
        border-bottom: none;
        background: transparent;
        padding: 8px;
        text-transform: capitalize;
        color: #fff;
        -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
                box-sizing: border-box;
        overflow: hidden;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button::after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          top: 50%;
          left: 50%;
          width: 5px;
          height: 5px;
          background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
          opacity: 0;
          border-radius: 100%;
          -webkit-transform: scale(1, 1) translate(-50%);
                  transform: scale(1, 1) translate(-50%);
          -webkit-transform-origin: 50% 50%;
                  transform-origin: 50% 50%;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button:focus:not(:active)::after {
          -webkit-animation: ripple 1s ease-out;
                  animation: ripple 1s ease-out;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button:hover, #app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button:focus {
          background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
          outline: none;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button:active {
          background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button:last-child {
          border-right: none;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons button:first-child {
          border-left: none;
}
#app .material .snotifyToast__buttons--bold {
        font-weight: 700;
}
@-webkit-keyframes ripple {
0% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(0, 0);
            transform: scale(0, 0);
    opacity: 1;
}
20% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(25, 25);
            transform: scale(25, 25);
    opacity: 1;
}
100% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: scale(40, 40);
            transform: scale(40, 40);
}
}
@keyframes ripple {
0% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(0, 0);
            transform: scale(0, 0);
    opacity: 1;
}
20% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(25, 25);
            transform: scale(25, 25);
    opacity: 1;
}
100% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: scale(40, 40);
            transform: scale(40, 40);
}
}
#app .material .snotify-icon {
      position: absolute;
      right: 10px;
      top: 50%;
      line-height: 0;
      -webkit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
              transform: translate(0, -50%);
      max-height: 48px;
      max-width: 48px;
}
#app .material .snotify-icon__error {
      fill: #ffcdd2;
}
#app .material .snotify-icon__warning {
      fill: #ffccbc;
}
#app .material .snotify-icon__info {
      fill: #bbdefb;
}
#app .material .snotify-icon__success {
      fill: #c8e6c9;
}
#app .material .snotify-icon__async {
      fill: #bbdefb;
      -webkit-animation: async 3s infinite linear;
              animation: async 3s infinite linear;
      -webkit-transform-origin: 50% 50%;
              transform-origin: 50% 50%;
}
@-webkit-keyframes async {
0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
    transform: rotate(0deg);
}
100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
    transform: rotate(360deg);
}
}
@keyframes async {
0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
    transform: rotate(0deg);
}
100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
    transform: rotate(360deg);
}
}
